sources.title: Saboteur 1942 colorized (Bob Cummings)
sources.description: A young aircraft worker (Bob Cummings) is accused of sabotage and must go on the run to prove his innocence. As he makes his way across the country all the way from California to New York, he meets a young woman (Priscilla Lane) who helps him. Directed by Alfred Hitchcock Priscilla Lane as Patricia "Pat" Martin Robert Cummings as Barry Kane Otto Kruger as Charles Tobin Alan Baxter as Freeman Clem Bevans as Neilson Norman Lloyd as Frank Fry If you have a request or a comment for me, please go to the Colorized Movies Forum at https://archive.org/details/colorized-movies?tab=forum I colorized this using AI software that doesn't always get the colors right, but I think it looks fairly natural. Hopefully a more professional job will be done someday.
